alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 22 at 1:56AM EST until November 22 at 2:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Eastern Franklin County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 245 AM EST. * At 155 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Crawfordville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1:52 AM EST, a 52 mph wind gust was measured at Panacea. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Newport, Alligator Point, Bald Point, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Tully, Plum Orchard, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Spring Creek, and Liveoak Island. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
